reviewtext: Excellent product while it lasts.  I have yet to have one of these last for more than four months.  I usually purchase a few at time so that I always have a spare for when ever it no longer works.  Because the telephone is so uncomfortable to hold, a handset is a necessity and this is the best one to have.  Unfortunately, it does not last for too long.
summary: Uniden HS910 Headset for Cordless Phones
